      • getTokenApiKey

        protected ApiKey getTokenApiKey(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                String apiKeyId)
                         throws OauthException
        Retrieves the ApiKey instance pointed by this apiKeyId and accessible from the application

        The ApiKey is retrieved from the Application passed as argument.

        This method asserts that the ApiKey retrieved status is ApiKeyStatus.ENABLED and also that the status of the account owner is AccountStatus.ENABLED

        Parameters:
        apiKeyId - - The id of the ApiKey embedded in the access token.
        Throws:
        OauthException
